The presence of a video shared by Reuter: 2. Confirmation from Raúl Castro, a player in the match, who stated in an interview with Bolivian news media that he would be adopting the dog.
Verification from Not One Paw Less: the shelter where the dog was transferred, confirming that Castro would be picking up the dog and that there would be a live broadcast of the event.
Testimony from Guissel Ramirez: in charge of the shelter, describing the dog's behavior and providing photos of the dog in the shelter, including his interaction with another dog named Dala.
